coupon_text: Free single or return tickets are available from West Midlands Trains for travel on their trains from Monday, March 20, 2023, to Friday, March 24, 2023 (one per account). Booking for this offer begins on Monday, March 13, 2023. There will be 10,000 tickets available on West Midlands Railways (for travel between Zones 1 and 5). Use the promo code at the bottom of this page to make it free. Train It Chooseday is the name of the campaign, and to take advantage of the deal, visit their website or app to get Anytime train tickets and enter the promotional code CHOOSEDAY.
